projects.Title: Blockchain-based reverse-auction system
projects.Description: Developed a Blockchain-based reverse-auction platform for car trading using Ethereum and Python. Blockchain ensured enhanced visibility, transparency, and payment automation.

projects.Title: Machine Learning on Medical Dataset
projects.Description: Compared the efficiency of traditional (RVM, SVM) vs bio-inspired (PSO, Cuckoo) models for medical data classification for breast cancer, diabetes, and Parkinsonâ€™s. Enhanced the algorithmic implementation for Cuckoo Search using Python to improve the efficiency gap from 26% to 9%.

projects.Title: HCI Answering Bot
projects.Description: Developed a deep-learning chatbot using Python to supplant traditional FAQ systems. Leveraged NLP using a Seq2Seq model, TensorFlow, and multi-layered LSTMs to predict question categories with 83% accuracy.
